keyword: how many calories in a tootsie pop
title: How Many Calories in a Tootsie Pop?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a tootsie pop, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, sugars, and sodium for this lollipop treat.
h1: How Many Calories in a Tootsie Pop?
assumptions: Standard size Tootsie Pop (cherry or similar flavor), about 17g total weight, including hard candy shell and Tootsie Roll center; no allergens added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, exact size, and manufacturer batch. Check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A single Tootsie Pop contains about 60 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tootsie pop?
faqs.a: Approximately 60 calories per standard Tootsie Pop.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: About 14g total carbs, all from sugars with 0g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Tootsie Pop have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's primarily a sugar-based candy.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in one Tootsie Pop?
Do different flavors change the calories in a Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: Slight variations by flavor, but standard flavors are consistently about 60 kcal.
